review_blob: Reminds me of a fine belgian urine, with notes of fruit, honey, and wheat. Overall not appealing and would do better in a toilet than a mouth.
beer_name: Samuel Adams LongShot Dortmunder Style Export

review_blob:
As a person who doesnt typically enjoy particularly dark beers, I was hesitant to try the Imperial Stout, but as I had never been displeased with any of SweetWaters offerings before, I gave it a shot.

WOW.

This is certainly the best beer Ive ever had, dark or light. Its crisp and rich, with a flavor that rivals any of the best in its own category or elsewhere.
beer_name: Sweetwater Tavern High Desert Imperial Stout

review_blob: A smoooth and refreshing Amber ale. Not for inexperienced drinkers or Europeans.

A light beer with a great, natural taste. Iit isnt as full bodied and aromatic as a guiness or other draught, but that should be obvious from the name. This beer really gets good when you hit the sixth or seventh can in a short period of time. Its more palatable and refreshing than any of Sam Adams offerings, and doesnt have that woody, stale flavor Miller Light sports. 

Certainly a beer for seasoned drinkers only. Rookies need not apply.
